title: Daddy's Little Angel
description: ";Mom always said my dad is the devil. I never knew she meant it literally!"; All Angel’s father (a.k.a. the Devil) wants is to be a part of her life. And in return he has the power to give her anything she wants€”including popularity and a date with her long-time crush, Cole Daniels. But Angel will only accept him on her get out of the devil business and leave his special powers out of the equation. Is Angel condemning herself to an eternity of lunch at the losers’ table? Or can she and Daddy Dearest strike some kind of deal? Download quiz scoring key
author: Shani Petroff
